name: PathCraft
summary: Playing with blocks is easy? Think again! Tease your brain with clever VR puzzling in the playful, handcrafted world of PathCraft, a deceptively simple puzzle platformer where you play with blocks to complete increasingly complex puzzles. Keep on your toes and react quickly to guide your little mini-me and successfully complete its path.  Next up, you can build and share your own levels with the level editor. Can you think outside the blocks?
